example.eg: I had thought about swimming, but the water looked freezing so I opted out.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 选择退出, 决定不参与

example.eg: In 1992, Denmark opted out of the single European currency.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 选择不加入, 决定不参与, 退出

example.eg: Tick this box to opt out of receiving our newsletter.
